pageTitle: Trident Technical College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {285525=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 179888=With Lottery Assisted Tuition (SC residence only) the cost of attendance is pretty low. Only about $2000 a semester., 2426=I have been at Trident since August of 2010 and so far I have nothing bad to say about the teacher and academic advisers who I have had or come into contact with. I have a full 15-hr schedule this semester and although my classes are all quite different and unique, I am learning many new things in them. One of my favorite classes is Western Civ post-1689; which may not sound important but it is because I usually resent history classes about western civilizations. This one however, I quite enjoy.}

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot For the most part, I tend to feel that Trident's classes are easier then similar classes that I took in high school. Trident does not present much of a difficulty as far as classes are concerned. For the most part, if you show up and pay attention, you can pass the class. Login to rate or flag the reviews Student from North Charleston, SC 07/02/2011 Reviewer is A past student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 71 Categories Comments Great for these types of students If you want hands on experience in your field of choice. Anything pertaining to IT, Medical, Automotive, Hospitality/Tourism and other fields. One thing is for certain, everything you learn here, can and will be applied in your field of choice.
